verses.text: \w King|strong="H4430"\w* \w Nebuchadnezzar|strong="H5020"\w* \w made|strong="H5648"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w golden|strong="H1722"\w* \w statue|strong="H6755"\w* \w sixty|strong="H8361"\w* cubits high \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w six|strong="H8353"\w* cubits \w wide|strong="H6613"\w*, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w he|strong="H1768"\w* \w set|strong="H6966"\w* it \w up|strong="H6966"\w* on \w the|strong="H5020"\w* \w plain|strong="H1236"\w* \w of|strong="H4430"\w* \w Dura|strong="H1757"\w* \w in|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H5020"\w* \w province|strong="H4083"\w* \w of|strong="H4430"\w* Babylon.

\w Then|strong="H1768"\w* \w King|strong="H4430"\w* \w Nebuchadnezzar|strong="H5020"\w* \w sent|strong="H7972"\w* word \w to|strong="H4430"\w* \w assemble|strong="H3673"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* satraps, \w prefects|strong="H5460"\w*, \w governors|strong="H6347"\w*, advisers, \w treasurers|strong="H1411"\w*, \w judges|strong="H1884"\w*, \w magistrates|strong="H8614"\w*, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w all|strong="H3606"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* other officials \w of|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w provinces|strong="H4083"\w* \w to|strong="H4430"\w* attend \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w dedication|strong="H2597"\w* \w of|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w statue|strong="H6755"\w* \w he|strong="H1768"\w* \w had|strong="H4430"\w* \w set|strong="H6966"\w* \w up|strong="H6966"\w*.

\w So|strong="H1768"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* satraps, \w prefects|strong="H5460"\w*, \w governors|strong="H6347"\w*, advisers, \w treasurers|strong="H1411"\w*, \w judges|strong="H1884"\w*, \w magistrates|strong="H8614"\w*, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w all|strong="H3606"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w rulers|strong="H7984"\w* \w of|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w provinces|strong="H4083"\w* \w assembled|strong="H3673"\w* \w for|strong="H1768"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w dedication|strong="H2597"\w* \w of|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w statue|strong="H6755"\w* \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w King|strong="H4430"\w* \w Nebuchadnezzar|strong="H5020"\w* \w had|strong="H4430"\w* \w set|strong="H6966"\w* \w up|strong="H6966"\w*, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w they|strong="H3606"\w* \w stood|strong="H6966"\w* \w before|strong="H6903"\w* it.

Then \w the|strong="H7123"\w* \w herald|strong="H3744"\w* \w loudly|strong="H2429"\w* \w proclaimed|strong="H7123"\w*, “\w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w people|strong="H5972"\w* \w of|strong="H5972"\w* every nation and \w language|strong="H3961"\w*, this is what you are commanded:

\w As|strong="H3606"\w* \w soon|strong="H1768"\w* \w as|strong="H3606"\w* \w you|strong="H1768"\w* \w hear|strong="H8086"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w sound|strong="H7032"\w* \w of|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w horn|strong="H7162"\w*, \w flute|strong="H4953"\w*, \w zither|strong="H7030"\w*, \w lyre|strong="H7030"\w*, \w harp|strong="H6460"\w*, \w pipes|strong="H5481"\w*, \w and|strong="H5308"\w* \w all|strong="H3606"\w* \w kinds|strong="H2178"\w* \w of|strong="H4430"\w* \w music|strong="H2170"\w*, \w you|strong="H1768"\w* must \w fall|strong="H5308"\w* \w down|strong="H5308"\w* \w and|strong="H5308"\w* \w worship|strong="H5457"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w golden|strong="H1722"\w* \w statue|strong="H6755"\w* \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w King|strong="H4430"\w* \w Nebuchadnezzar|strong="H5020"\w* \w has|strong="H1768"\w* \w set|strong="H6966"\w* \w up|strong="H6966"\w*.

\w And|strong="H5308"\w* \w whoever|strong="H4479"\w* does \w not|strong="H3809"\w* \w fall|strong="H5308"\w* \w down|strong="H5308"\w* \w and|strong="H5308"\w* \w worship|strong="H5457"\w* \w will|strong="H1768"\w* \w immediately|strong="H8160"\w* \w be|strong="H3809"\w* thrown \w into|strong="H1459"\w* \w the|strong="H5457"\w* \w blazing|strong="H3345"\w* \w fiery|strong="H5135"\w* furnace.”

\w Therefore|strong="H3606"\w*, \w as|strong="H3606"\w* \w soon|strong="H1768"\w* \w as|strong="H3606"\w* \w all|strong="H3606"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w people|strong="H5972"\w* \w heard|strong="H8086"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w sound|strong="H7032"\w* \w of|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w horn|strong="H7162"\w*, \w flute|strong="H4953"\w*, \w zither|strong="H7030"\w*, \w lyre|strong="H7030"\w*, \w harp|strong="H6460"\w*, \w and|strong="H5308"\w* \w all|strong="H3606"\w* \w kinds|strong="H2178"\w* \w of|strong="H4430"\w* \w music|strong="H2170"\w*, \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w people|strong="H5972"\w* \w of|strong="H4430"\w* \w every|strong="H3606"\w* nation \w and|strong="H5308"\w* \w language|strong="H3961"\w* would \w fall|strong="H5308"\w* \w down|strong="H5308"\w* \w and|strong="H5308"\w* \w worship|strong="H5457"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w golden|strong="H1722"\w* \w statue|strong="H6755"\w* \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w King|strong="H4430"\w* \w Nebuchadnezzar|strong="H5020"\w* \w had|strong="H4430"\w* \w set|strong="H6966"\w* \w up|strong="H6966"\w*.

\w At|strong="H6903"\w* \w this|strong="H1836"\w* \w time|strong="H2166"\w* some astrologers \w came|strong="H7127"\w* \w forward|strong="H7127"\w* \w and|strong="H7127"\w* maliciously \w accused|strong="H7170"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w Jews|strong="H3062"\w*,

saying \w to|strong="H4430"\w* \w King|strong="H4430"\w* \w Nebuchadnezzar|strong="H5020"\w*, “\w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w*, may you \w live|strong="H2418"\w* \w forever|strong="H5957"\w*!

\w You|strong="H1768"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w*, \w have|strong="H7761"\w* \w issued|strong="H7761"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w decree|strong="H2942"\w* \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w everyone|strong="H3606"\w* \w who|strong="H1768"\w* \w hears|strong="H8086"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w sound|strong="H7032"\w* \w of|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w horn|strong="H7162"\w*, \w flute|strong="H4953"\w*, \w zither|strong="H7030"\w*, \w lyre|strong="H7030"\w*, \w harp|strong="H6460"\w*, \w pipes|strong="H5481"\w*, \w and|strong="H5308"\w* \w all|strong="H3606"\w* \w kinds|strong="H2178"\w* \w of|strong="H4430"\w* \w music|strong="H2170"\w* must \w fall|strong="H5308"\w* \w down|strong="H5308"\w* \w and|strong="H5308"\w* \w worship|strong="H5457"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w golden|strong="H1722"\w* \w statue|strong="H6755"\w*,

\w and|strong="H5308"\w* \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w whoever|strong="H4479"\w* does \w not|strong="H3809"\w* \w fall|strong="H5308"\w* \w down|strong="H5308"\w* \w and|strong="H5308"\w* \w worship|strong="H5457"\w* \w will|strong="H1768"\w* \w be|strong="H3809"\w* thrown \w into|strong="H1459"\w* \w the|strong="H5457"\w* \w blazing|strong="H3345"\w* \w fiery|strong="H5135"\w* furnace.

\w But|strong="H1768"\w* \w there|strong="H1768"\w* \w are|strong="H1768"\w* some \w Jews|strong="H3062"\w* \w you|strong="H1768"\w* \w have|strong="H7761"\w* \w appointed|strong="H4483"\w* \w to|strong="H5922"\w* manage \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w province|strong="H4083"\w* \w of|strong="H4430"\w* Babylon—\w Shadrach|strong="H7715"\w*, \w Meshach|strong="H4336"\w*, \w and|strong="H4336"\w* Abednego—\w who|strong="H1768"\w* \w have|strong="H7761"\w* ignored \w you|strong="H1768"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w*, \w and|strong="H4336"\w* \w have|strong="H7761"\w* refused \w to|strong="H5922"\w* \w serve|strong="H6399"\w* \w your|strong="H6399"\w* gods \w or|strong="H3809"\w* \w worship|strong="H5457"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w golden|strong="H1722"\w* \w statue|strong="H6755"\w* \w you|strong="H1768"\w* \w have|strong="H7761"\w* \w set|strong="H6966"\w* \w up|strong="H6966"\w*.”

\w Then|strong="H4430"\w* \w Nebuchadnezzar|strong="H5020"\w*, furious with \w rage|strong="H7266"\w*, summoned \w Shadrach|strong="H7715"\w*, \w Meshach|strong="H4336"\w*, \w and|strong="H4336"\w* Abednego. So these \w men|strong="H1400"\w* \w were|strong="H1400"\w* brought \w before|strong="H6925"\w* \w the|strong="H5020"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w*,

\w and|strong="H6032"\w* \w Nebuchadnezzar|strong="H5020"\w* \w said|strong="H6032"\w* \w to|strong="H5665"\w* them, “\w Shadrach|strong="H7715"\w*, \w Meshach|strong="H4336"\w*, \w and|strong="H6032"\w* Abednego, \w is|strong="H1768"\w* it \w true|strong="H6656"\w* \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w you|strong="H1768"\w* do \w not|strong="H3809"\w* \w serve|strong="H6399"\w* \w my|strong="H6399"\w* gods \w or|strong="H3809"\w* \w worship|strong="H5457"\w* \w the|strong="H5020"\w* \w golden|strong="H1722"\w* \w statue|strong="H6755"\w* \w I|strong="H1768"\w* \w have|strong="H5020"\w* \w set|strong="H6966"\w* \w up|strong="H6966"\w*?

\w Now|strong="H3705"\w* \w when|strong="H1768"\w* \w you|strong="H1768"\w* \w hear|strong="H8086"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w sound|strong="H7032"\w* \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w horn|strong="H7162"\w*, \w flute|strong="H4953"\w*, \w zither|strong="H7030"\w*, \w lyre|strong="H7030"\w*, \w harp|strong="H6460"\w*, \w pipes|strong="H5481"\w*, \w and|strong="H5308"\w* \w all|strong="H3606"\w* \w kinds|strong="H2178"\w* \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w music|strong="H2170"\w*, \w if|strong="H2006"\w* \w you|strong="H1768"\w* \w are|strong="H1768"\w* \w ready|strong="H6263"\w* \w to|strong="H5308"\w* \w fall|strong="H5308"\w* \w down|strong="H5308"\w* \w and|strong="H5308"\w* \w worship|strong="H5457"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w statue|strong="H6755"\w* \w I|strong="H4481"\w* \w have|strong="H1768"\w* \w made|strong="H5648"\w*, very good. \w But|strong="H1768"\w* \w if|strong="H2006"\w* \w you|strong="H1768"\w* refuse \w to|strong="H5308"\w* \w worship|strong="H5457"\w*, \w you|strong="H1768"\w* \w will|strong="H1768"\w* \w be|strong="H3809"\w* thrown at once \w into|strong="H1459"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w blazing|strong="H3345"\w* \w fiery|strong="H5135"\w* furnace. \w Then|strong="H1768"\w* \w what|strong="H4479"\w* god \w will|strong="H1768"\w* \w be|strong="H3809"\w* able \w to|strong="H5308"\w* \w deliver|strong="H7804"\w* \w you|strong="H1768"\w* \w from|strong="H4481"\w* \w my|strong="H4481"\w* \w hands|strong="H3028"\w*?”

\w Shadrach|strong="H7715"\w*, \w Meshach|strong="H4336"\w*, \w and|strong="H6032"\w* Abednego \w replied|strong="H6032"\w* \w to|strong="H5922"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w*, “\w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Nebuchadnezzar|strong="H5020"\w*, \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H5020"\w* \w no|strong="H3809"\w* \w need|strong="H2818"\w* \w to|strong="H5922"\w* \w answer|strong="H6600"\w* \w you|strong="H5922"\w* \w in|strong="H5922"\w* \w this|strong="H1836"\w* \w matter|strong="H6600"\w*.

\w If|strong="H2006"\w* \w the|strong="H4481"\w* God \w whom|strong="H1768"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w serve|strong="H6399"\w* exists, \w then|strong="H1768"\w* \w He|strong="H1768"\w* \w is|strong="H1768"\w* \w able|strong="H3202"\w* \w to|strong="H3202"\w* \w deliver|strong="H7804"\w* \w us|strong="H7804"\w* \w from|strong="H4481"\w* \w the|strong="H4481"\w* \w blazing|strong="H3345"\w* \w fiery|strong="H5135"\w* furnace \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w from|strong="H4481"\w* \w your|strong="H6399"\w* \w hand|strong="H3028"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w*.

\w But|strong="H1768"\w* \w even|strong="H1768"\w* \w if|strong="H2006"\w* \w He|strong="H1768"\w* \w does|strong="H1934"\w* \w not|strong="H3809"\w*, let \w it|strong="H1934"\w* \w be|strong="H1934"\w* \w known|strong="H3046"\w* \w to|strong="H3046"\w* \w you|strong="H1768"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w*, \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H1768"\w* \w not|strong="H3809"\w* \w serve|strong="H6399"\w* \w your|strong="H6399"\w* gods \w or|strong="H2006"\w* \w worship|strong="H5457"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w golden|strong="H1722"\w* \w statue|strong="H6755"\w* \w you|strong="H1768"\w* \w have|strong="H1934"\w* \w set|strong="H6966"\w* \w up|strong="H6966"\w*.”

At \w this|strong="H5922"\w*, \w Nebuchadnezzar|strong="H5020"\w* \w was|strong="H5020"\w* \w filled|strong="H4391"\w* \w with|strong="H5922"\w* rage, \w and|strong="H6032"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w expression|strong="H6755"\w* \w on|strong="H5922"\w* \w his|strong="H5922"\w* face \w changed|strong="H8133"\w* \w toward|strong="H5922"\w* \w Shadrach|strong="H7715"\w*, \w Meshach|strong="H4336"\w*, \w and|strong="H6032"\w* Abednego. \w He|strong="H1768"\w* gave orders \w to|strong="H5922"\w* heat \w the|strong="H5922"\w* furnace \w seven|strong="H7655"\w* \w times|strong="H7655"\w* \w hotter|strong="H5922"\w* \w than|strong="H1768"\w* usual,

\w and|strong="H4336"\w* \w he|strong="H1768"\w* commanded some \w mighty|strong="H1401"\w* \w men|strong="H1400"\w* \w of|strong="H1768"\w* valor \w in|strong="H1768"\w* \w his|strong="H1768"\w* \w army|strong="H2429"\w* \w to|strong="H2429"\w* \w tie|strong="H3729"\w* \w up|strong="H3729"\w* \w Shadrach|strong="H7715"\w*, \w Meshach|strong="H4336"\w*, \w and|strong="H4336"\w* Abednego \w and|strong="H4336"\w* throw them \w into|strong="H7412"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w blazing|strong="H3345"\w* \w fiery|strong="H5135"\w* furnace.

So they \w were|strong="H1400"\w* \w tied|strong="H3729"\w* \w up|strong="H3729"\w*, wearing robes, \w trousers|strong="H5622"\w*, \w turbans|strong="H3737"\w*, and other \w clothes|strong="H3831"\w*, and they \w were|strong="H1400"\w* thrown \w into|strong="H1459"\w* the \w blazing|strong="H3345"\w* \w fiery|strong="H5135"\w* furnace.

\w The|strong="H3606"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w*’s \w command|strong="H4406"\w* \w was|strong="H4430"\w* \w so|strong="H1768"\w* \w urgent|strong="H2685"\w* \w and|strong="H4336"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* furnace \w so|strong="H1768"\w* hot \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w fiery|strong="H5135"\w* \w flames|strong="H7631"\w* \w killed|strong="H6992"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w men|strong="H1400"\w* \w who|strong="H1768"\w* carried \w up|strong="H5267"\w* \w Shadrach|strong="H7715"\w*, \w Meshach|strong="H4336"\w*, \w and|strong="H4336"\w* Abednego.

\w And|strong="H4336"\w* these \w three|strong="H8532"\w* \w men|strong="H1400"\w*, \w Shadrach|strong="H7715"\w*, \w Meshach|strong="H4336"\w*, \w and|strong="H4336"\w* Abednego, firmly \w bound|strong="H3729"\w*, \w fell|strong="H5308"\w* \w into|strong="H1459"\w* the \w blazing|strong="H3345"\w* \w fiery|strong="H5135"\w* furnace.

Suddenly \w King|strong="H4430"\w* \w Nebuchadnezzar|strong="H5020"\w* jumped \w up|strong="H6966"\w* \w in|strong="H4430"\w* amazement \w and|strong="H6032"\w* asked \w his|strong="H5020"\w* advisers, “Did \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3809"\w* throw \w three|strong="H8532"\w* \w men|strong="H1400"\w*, firmly \w bound|strong="H3729"\w*, \w into|strong="H1459"\w* \w the|strong="H5020"\w* \w fire|strong="H5135"\w*?” “\w Certainly|strong="H3330"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w*,” \w they|strong="H3809"\w* \w replied|strong="H6032"\w*.

“\w Look|strong="H1888"\w*!” \w he|strong="H1768"\w* \w exclaimed|strong="H6032"\w*. “\w I|strong="H1768"\w* \w see|strong="H2370"\w* four \w men|strong="H1400"\w*, unbound \w and|strong="H6032"\w* unharmed, \w walking|strong="H1981"\w* around \w in|strong="H1981"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w fire|strong="H5135"\w*—\w and|strong="H6032"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w fourth|strong="H7244"\w* looks \w like|strong="H1821"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w son|strong="H1247"\w* \w of|strong="H1247"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* gods!”

\w Then|strong="H1768"\w* \w Nebuchadnezzar|strong="H5020"\w* \w approached|strong="H7127"\w* \w the|strong="H4481"\w* \w door|strong="H8651"\w* \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w the|strong="H4481"\w* \w blazing|strong="H3345"\w* \w fiery|strong="H5135"\w* furnace \w and|strong="H6032"\w* called \w out|strong="H5312"\w*, “\w Shadrach|strong="H7715"\w*, \w Meshach|strong="H4336"\w*, \w and|strong="H6032"\w* Abednego, \w servants|strong="H5649"\w* \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w the|strong="H4481"\w* \w Most|strong="H5943"\w* \w High|strong="H5943"\w* God, \w come|strong="H7127"\w* \w out|strong="H5312"\w*!” \w So|strong="H1768"\w* \w Shadrach|strong="H7715"\w*, \w Meshach|strong="H4336"\w*, \w and|strong="H6032"\w* Abednego \w came|strong="H7127"\w* \w out|strong="H5312"\w* \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w the|strong="H4481"\w* \w fire|strong="H5135"\w*,

\w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w when|strong="H1768"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* satraps, \w prefects|strong="H5460"\w*, \w governors|strong="H6347"\w*, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w royal|strong="H4430"\w* advisers \w had|strong="H4430"\w* \w gathered|strong="H3673"\w* \w around|strong="H3673"\w*, \w they|strong="H1768"\w* \w saw|strong="H2370"\w* \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w fire|strong="H5135"\w* \w had|strong="H4430"\w* \w no|strong="H3809"\w* \w effect|strong="H7981"\w* \w on|strong="H7981"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w bodies|strong="H1655"\w* \w of|strong="H4430"\w* these \w men|strong="H1400"\w*. \w Not|strong="H3809"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w hair|strong="H8177"\w* \w of|strong="H4430"\w* their \w heads|strong="H7217"\w* \w was|strong="H1655"\w* \w singed|strong="H2761"\w*, their robes \w were|strong="H1400"\w* unaffected, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w there|strong="H1768"\w* \w was|strong="H1655"\w* \w no|strong="H3809"\w* \w smell|strong="H7382"\w* \w of|strong="H4430"\w* \w fire|strong="H5135"\w* \w on|strong="H7981"\w* them.
